alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 12 at 6:11AM CDT until May 12 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and Wyoming, including the following areas, in panhandle Nebraska, Banner County, Box Butte County, Cheyenne County, Dawes County, Kimball County, Morrill County, Northern Sioux County, Scotts Bluff County and Southern Sioux County. In Wyoming, Central Laramie County, Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, Converse County Lower Elevations, East Laramie County, East Platte County, Goshen County, Laramie Valley, Niobrara County, North Laramie Range, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
